==== Report ====
Five people turned out for the GIMP Hands-On session. Many features of the GIMP were covered and feedback was also given as to more topics that the attendees would like to see covered.

==== Topic ====
GIMP -- Image Editor

Charles Profitt will give a brief over-view of GIMP with a hands on demonstration on how certain things can be done.

Details:
* '''address''': Barnes and Noble @ RIT
* '''date''': January 7th, 2010
* '''time''': 7pm until 9pm
* '''room''': Upstairs Meeting Room
